private_bills.description: A Bill to make new provision for the making of statutes for the University of London; and for related purposes.
private_bills.title: University of London

private_bills.description: A Bill to amend and update the powers of the Middle Level Commissioners to regulate navigation on the Middle Level of the Fens in the city of Peterborough and the counties of Cambridgeshire and Norfolk; to make further provision as to the regulation of navigation on those waterways; to make other provision as to the Commissioners; and for connected purposes.
private_bills.title: Middle Level

private_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for a railway between a junction with Phase One of High Speed 2, near Fradley Wood in Staffordshire, and a junction with the West Coast Main Line near Crewe in Cheshire; and for connected purposes.
private_bills.title: High Speed Rail (West Midlands - Crewe)

private_bills.description: To make provision relating to the public open spaces under the management and control of the City of London Corporation; and for related purposes.
private_bills.title: City of London Corporation (Open Spaces)

private_bills.description: To confer powers upon New Southgate Cemetery and Crematorium Limited and the National Spiritual Assembly of the Bahá'is of the United Kingdom to extinguish rights of burial and disturb human remains in respect of New Southgate Cemetery for the purpose of increasing the space for interments; and for connected purposes.
private_bills.title: New Southgate Cemetery

private_bills.description: A Bill to amend certain provisions of the Richmond Burgage Pastures Act 1853.
private_bills.title: Richmond Burgage Pastures

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for affordable home ownership; to require the inclusion of rent to buy homes in the definition of affordable housing; to make provision for a minimum proportion of new affordable housing to be available on affordable rent to buy terms; to provide relief from stamp duty when an affordable rent to buy home is purchased; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Affordable Home Ownership

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about private prosecutions in cases of suspected criminal fraud in certain circumstances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Criminal Fraud (Private Prosecutions)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to require cost-benefit analysis and independent audit before payments are made by the Government to a foreign country or international organisation; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: International Payments (Audit)

public_bills.description: A Bill to remove certain restrictions on the production and sale of goods manufactured in the United Kingdom for use in the United Kingdom, in connection with the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the EU; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Manufactured Goods (Trade)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the recruitment and retention of Volunteer Reserves for the Armed Forces; to make provision for the eligibility for deployment of such reserves; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Armed Forces (Volunteer Reserve)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose duties on the Electoral Commission to investigate allegations of electoral fraud and other breaches of electoral law and to act as the prosecuting authority for such offences; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Electoral Commission (Duties)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the availability of public services during weekday evenings, at weekends and on bank holidays; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Public Services (Availability)

public_bills.description: A Bill to enable schools to select pupils on the basis of published criteria; to allow schools to determine maximum class sizes; to remove restrictions on the expansion of the number of pupils in schools and on the creation of new schools; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Schools

public_bills.description: A Bill To authorise new expenditure for certain agricultural and other purposes; to make provision about direct payments during an agricultural transition period following the United Kingdom’s departure from the European Union; to make provision about the acquisition and use of information connected with food supply chains; to confer power to respond to exceptional market conditions affecting agricultural markets; to confer power to modify retained direct EU legislation relating to agricultural and rural development payments and public market intervention and private storage aid; to make provision about marketing standards and the classification of carcasses; to make provision for the recognition of associations of agricultural producers which may benefit from certain exemptions from competition law; to confer power to make regulations about contracts for the purchase of agricultural products from agricultural producers and securing compliance with the WTO Agreement on Agriculture; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Agriculture

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the reduction of tariffs on goods imported into the United Kingdom; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Import Tariff (Reduction)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the maintenance and repair of roads by local authorities in England; to make provision for prescribing the use of funds for this purpose; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Roads (Investment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the accountability of clinical commissioning groups; to make provision about local referendums on NHS sustainability and transformation plans; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Healthcare (Local Accountability)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make the breach of certain rules relating to sub-letting rented accommodation a criminal offence; to make provision for criminal sanctions in respect of unauthorised sub-letting; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Sublet Property (Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Government to publish an annual review of the net yield to HM Treasury of tax rates and duties levied, including estimates of the impact on yield of changes to rates of those taxes and duties; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Tax Rates and Duties (Review)

public_bills.description: A Bill to reduce Value Added Tax on domestic energy bills; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Domestic Energy (Value Added Tax)

public_bills.description: To amend the Parliamentary Constituencies Act 1986 to make provision about the number and size of parliamentary constituencies in the United Kingdom; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Parliamentary Constituencies (Amendment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision extending the basis on which British citizens outside the UK qualify to participate in parliamentary elections; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Overseas Electors

public_bills.description: A Bill to restrict the rights of vessels not registered in the United Kingdom to fish in territorial waters; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Fishing (Access to Territorial Waters)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the reduction of stamp duty rates on residential property.
public_bills.title: Stamp Duty

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the forgiveness or discharge of student loan debt in certain circumstances; to make provision about the treatment of student loan debt in bankruptcy proceedings; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Student Loans (Debt Discharge)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for fruit and vegetables to be classified by flavour, condition and size for the purposes of sale in the UK; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Fruit and Vegetables (Classification)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the use of published criteria to determine whether mobile homes and park homes are liable for council tax or non-domestic rates; to make provision in relation to the residential status of such homes; to amend the Mobile Home Acts; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Mobile Homes and Park Homes

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to enhance the protection available for bat habitats in the non-built environment and to limit the protection for bat habitats in the built environment where the presence of bats has a significant adverse impact upon the users of buildings; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Bat Habitats Regulation (No. 2)

public_bills.description: To make provision for buildings used as nursery grounds to be exempt from nondomestic rates in England and Wales.
public_bills.title: Non-Domestic Rating (Nursery Grounds)

public_bills.description: A Bill to introduce more freedom, flexibility and opportunity for those seeking employment in the public and private sector; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Employment Opportunities

public_bills.description: A Bill to create offences in respect of persons that have entered the UK illegally or who have remained in the UK without legal authority; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Illegal Immigration (Offences)

public_bills.description: To facilitate the formation of an Executive in Northern Ireland by extending the time for making Ministerial appointments following the election of the Northern Ireland Assembly on 2 March 2017; and to make provision about the exercise of governmental functions in, or in relation to, Northern Ireland in the absence of Northern Ireland Ministers.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland (Executive Formation and Exercise of Functions)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the law relating to housing; to make provision about housing space and thermal performance standards; to place a duty on the Secretary of State to require the provision of serviced plots of land; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Housing Reform

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit dealing in ivory, and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Ivory

public_bills.description: To provide that opposite sex couples may enter a civil partnership; to make provision about the registration of the names of the mother of each party to a marriage or civil partnership; to make provision about the registration of stillborn deaths; to give coroners the power to investigate stillborn deaths; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Civil Partnerships, Marriages and Deaths (Registration Etc.)

public_bills.description: To make provision for and in connection with offences relating to offensive weapons.
public_bills.title: Offensive Weapons

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about whiplash claims and the personal injury discount rate.
public_bills.title: Civil Liability

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Children Act 1989 to state that proceedings under Section 5A of, and Schedule 2 to, the Female Genital Mutilation Act 2003 are family proceedings
public_bills.title: Children Act 1989 (Amendment) (Female Genital Mutilation)

public_bills.description: Make provision prohibiting landlords and letting agents from requiring certain payments to be made or certain other steps to be taken; to make provision about the payment of holding deposits; to make provision about enforcement and about the lead enforcement authority; to amend the provisions of the Consumer Rights Act 2015 about information to be provided by letting agents and the provisions of the Housing and Planning Act 2016 about client money protection schemes; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Tenant Fees

public_bills.description: To make provision in relation to terrorism; to make provision enabling persons at ports and borders to be questioned for national security and other related purposes; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Counter-Terrorism and Border Security

public_bills.description: A Bill to re-establish the Secretary of State’s legal duty as to the National Health Service in England and to make provision about the other duties of the Secretary of State in that regard; to make provision for establishing Integrated Health Boards and about the administration and accountability of the National Health Service in England; to make provision about ending private finance initiatives in the National Health Service in England; to exclude the National Health Service from international trade agreements; to repeal sections 38 and 39 of the Immigration Act 2014; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: National Health Service

public_bills.description: A Bill to require producers of packaging products to assume responsibility for the collection, transportation, recycling, disposal, treatment and recovery of those products; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Packaging (Extended Producer Responsibility)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to promote and secure youth services and provision of a requisite standard; to impose a duty on local authorities to provide youth services and establish local youth service partnerships with youth participation; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Youth (Services and Provisions)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the regulation of physician associates; to make physician associate a protected title; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Physician Associates (Regulation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about shared parental leave and pay for workers, including those that are self-employed; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Shared Parental Leave and Pay (Extension)

public_bills.description: a Bill to provide for the representation of Gibraltar by a Member of the House of Commons; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Representation of the People (Gibraltar)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit the use of certain anti-loitering devices without a licence; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Anti-Loitering Devices (Regulation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about protecting retention deposits in connection with construction contracts; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Construction (Retention Deposit Schemes)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide that any Withdrawal Agreement between the United Kingdom and the European Union shall not have effect without a vote by the electorate of the United Kingdom and Gibraltar to that effect; to make arrangements for the holding of such a public vote; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: European Union Withdrawal Agreement (Public Vote)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the law relating to abortion in England and Wales, and Northern Ireland; to remove criminal liability in respect of abortion performed with the consent of the pregnant woman up to the twenty-fourth week of pregnancy; to repeal sections 59 and 60 of the Offences Against the Person Act 1861; to create offences of termination of a pregnancy after its twenty-fourth week and non-consensual termination of a pregnancy; to amend the law relating to conscientious objection to participation in abortion treatment; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Abortion

public_bills.description: To make certain acts of voyeurism an offence, and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Voyeurism (Offences) (No. 2)

public_bills.description: To make provision about the oversight and management of the appropriate use of force in relation to people in mental health units and similar institutions; to make provision about the use of body cameras by police officers in the course of duties in relation to people in mental health units; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Mental Health Units (Use of Force)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the regulation of the purchase of freehold by leaseholders; to introduce a system for establishing the maximum charge for such freehold; to make provision about the award of legal costs in leasehold property tribunal cases; to establish a compensation scheme for cases where misleading particulars have led to certain leasehold agreements; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Leasehold Reform

public_bills.description: A Bill to enable electricity generators to become local electricity suppliers; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Electricity

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about overseas production orders
public_bills.title: Crime (Overseas Production Orders)

public_bills.description: A Bill to equalise the assessment and enforcement of child maintenance arrangements of children of self-employed parents with those of children of other employed parents; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Child Maintenance (Assessment of Parents' Income)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Mental Capacity Act 2005 in relation to procedures in accordance with which a person may be deprived of liberty where the person lacks capacity to consent, and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Mental Capacity (Amendment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to increase the minimum custodial sentence on conviction for possession of a knife or other offensive weapon for an offender aged 18 years or over and to increase the minimum period of detention and training order for a person aged 16 or 17; to set a minimum custodial sentence on conviction for an offender in possession of a knife or other weapon and intending to commit any offence or having such a weapon available to use in committing murder; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Violent Crime (Sentences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prevent the Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) Act 2009 from expiring on 11 November 2019.
public_bills.title: Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) (Amendment)

public_bills.description: Make provision about the implementation of international trade agreements; to make provision establishing the Trade Remedies Authority and conferring functions on it; and to make provision about the collection and disclosure of information relating to trade.
public_bills.title: Trade

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the minimum price at which alcohol may be sold from licensed premises in England; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Alcohol (Minimum Pricing) (England)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make administrators and moderators of certain online forums responsible for content published on those forums; to require such administrators and moderators to remove certain content; to require platforms to publish information about such forums; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Online Forums

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the registration of marriages.
public_bills.title: Registration of Marriage (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to raise the minimum age of consent to marriage or civil partnership to eighteen; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Marriage and Civil Partnership (Minimum Age)

public_bills.description: A Bill to enable the establishment of collective defined contribution pension schemes; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Collective Defined Contribution Pension Schemes

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the judiciary and the functions of the staff of courts and tribunals
public_bills.title: Courts and Tribunals (Judiciary and Functions of Staff)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision, where two or more hereditaments occupied or owned by the same person meet certain conditions as to contiguity, for those hereditaments to be treated for the purposes of non-domestic rating as one hereditament; and to increase the percentage by which a billing authority in England may increase the council tax payable in respect of a long-term empty dwelling.
public_bills.title: Rating (Property in Common Occupation) and Council Tax (Empty Dwellings)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to report annually on the representativeness in respect of relevant postcode districts of weather stations designated for the purpose of calculating cold weather payments and to conduct a study of alternative methods of calculating cold weather in each postcode district; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Cold Weather Payments

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about interference with wireless telegraphy in prisons and similar institutions.
public_bills.title: Prisons (Interference with Wireless Telegraphy)

public_bills.description: A Bill to establish, and make provision about, the National Data Guardian for Health and Social Care; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Health and Social Care (National Data Guardian)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to prevent unsolicited calls; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Unsolicited Calls (Prevention)

public_bills.description: A Bill to regulate the sale and use of fetal dopplers; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Fetal Dopplers (Regulation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about transport services for patients travelling to and from hospital appointments, including requiring the Government to review the current provision of public and private transport services for such purposes; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Hospital Patients (Transport)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about support for victims who have been severely injured or bereaved as a result of acts of terrorism by an unconnected person or organisation in the United Kingdom; to establish a review of pension support for such victims; to require that review to make proposals for additional support taking account of the effects on occupational pension provision for such victims; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Victims of Terrorism (Pensions and Other Support)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose a limit on the level of international development assistance at an amount equal to the European Union average of equivalent expenditure; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: International Development Assistance (Limit)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the indication of country of origin for ceramic products; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Ceramics (Country of Origin Marking)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the criminal records of persons aged under 18 on the day an offence was committed; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Criminal Records (Childhood Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to terminate a rail passenger services franchise agreement in certain circumstances; to repeal section 25 of the Railways Act 1993; to make provision for local franchising authorities in England; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Railways (Franchises)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide a renewed constitutional form for the peoples of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, to continue to join together to form the United Kingdom, to affirm that the peoples of those nations and parts have chosen, subject to and in accordance with the provisions of this Act, to continue to pool their sovereignty for specified purposes, and to protect social and economic rights for citizens
public_bills.title: Act of Union

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to guarantee paid employment for six months for claimants of Jobseeker’s Allowance, or the jobseeker’s component of Universal Credit, who have been unemployed for six months or longer; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Employment Guarantee

public_bills.description: A Bill to abolish the House of Lords and make provision for its replacement by a Senate.
public_bills.title: House of Lords (Abolition and Replacement)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require householders to notify local authorities of an intention to register accommodation for short or holiday lets; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Short and Holiday-Let Accommodation (Notification of Local Authorities)

public_bills.description: A Bill to establish a review of pension arrangements for women affected by changes made by the Pensions Act 1995 and the Pensions Act 2011; to require the review in particular to undertake costings for a compensation scheme and consider the operation of section 1(4) of the Pensions Act 2011; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Pensions (Review of Women's Arrangements) (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Human Fertilisation and Embryology Act 1990 to make provision about the welfare of women undergoing any medical, surgical or obstetric treatment services provided for the purpose of assisting such women to carry children; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Human Fertilisation and Embryology (Welfare of Women)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about offences when perpetrated against retail workers; to make certain offences aggravated when perpetrated against such workers in the course of their employment; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Assaults on Retail Workers (Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the succession to the title of the Duke of Cornwall, to remove various powers, exemptions and immunities from the Duchy of Cornwall, to make provisions relating to the Treasury Solicitor and any solicitor or attorney appointed in the affairs of the Duchy, and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Duchy of Cornwall

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for passengers to receive automatic compensation from travel operators in certain circumstances; to require train operators to ring-fence certain funds received from Network Rail for service disruption and planned possessions for the development of ticketing technology to facilitate the payment of automatic compensation for passengers; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Automatic Travel Compensation

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the protection of pollinators; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Protection of Pollinators

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about leave and pay for employees whose children have died.
public_bills.title: Parental Bereavement (Leave and Pay)

public_bills.description: To make provision about offences when perpetrated against emergency workers, and persons assisting such workers; to make certain offences aggravated when perpetrated against such workers in the exercise of their duty; to require persons suspected of certain assaults against such workers which may pose a health risk to provide intimate samples and to make it an offence, without reasonable excuse, to refuse to provide such samples; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Assaults on Emergency Workers (Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose and regulate a duty of customs by reference to the importation of goods into the United Kingdom; to confer a power to impose and regulate a duty of customs by reference to the export of goods from the United Kingdom; to make other provision in relation to any duty of customs in connection with the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the EU; to amend the law relating to value added tax, and the law relating to any excise duty on goods, in connection with that withdrawal; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Taxation (Cross-border Trade)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require specified planning controls in relation to developments likely to be affected by existing noise sources; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Planning (Agent of Change)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make amendments of the Human Tissue Act 2004 concerning consent to activities done for the purpose of transplantation; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Organ Donation (Deemed Consent)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require certain matters to be taken into account when assessing a borrower’s creditworthiness
public_bills.title: Creditworthiness Assessment

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to undertake a public consultation on innovative technologies and energy consumption in households and commercial properties and to report on responses to that consultation and steps to be taken to encourage the development of innovative technologies to reduce energy consumption; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Energy Consumption (Innovative Technologies)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to decriminalise the non-payment of the BBC licence fee.
public_bills.title: BBC Licence Fee (Civil Penalty)

public_bills.description: A Bill to reduce the voting age to 16 in parliamentary and other elections; to make provision about young people's education in citizenship and the constitution; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Representation of the People (Young People's Enfranchisement and Education)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the House of Lords Act 1999 so as to abolish the system of by-elections for hereditary Peers.
public_bills.title: House of Lords (Hereditary Peers) (Abolition of By-Elections)

public_bills.description: A Bill to repeal provisions for the compulsory retirement of holders of judicial office on the grounds of age; to remove upper age limits for appointment to judicial office; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Judicial Appointments and Retirements (Age Limits)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the imposition of a cap on rates charged to domestic customers for the supply of gas and electricity; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Domestic Gas and Electricity (Tariff Cap)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for a railway between a junction with Phase One of High Speed 2, near Fradley Wood in Staffordshire, and a junction with the West Coast Main Line near Crewe in Cheshire; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: High Speed Rail (West Midlands - Crewe)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the registration of marriages.
public_bills.title: Registration of Marriage

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for local authorities to monitor the educational, physical and emotional development of children receiving elective home education, and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Home Education (Duty of Local Authorities)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the accessibility of air travel for people with disabilities; to establish requirements about parking at airports for people with disabilities; to require airports and airlines to report steps taken to improve accessibility; to require a named person to be responsible for air passengers with disabilities; to make provision about the design and adaptation of aircraft to meet the needs of passengers with disabilities; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Civil Aviation (Accessibility)

public_bills.description: A Bill to repeal the European Communities Act 1972 and make other provision in connection with the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the EU.
public_bills.title: European Union (Withdrawal)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the driver of a mechanically propelled vehicle involved in an accident resulting in injury or death to a cat to stop and give information or report the accident to the police; to require the keepers of certain cats to ensure they are microchipped; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Cats

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for information and statistics to be available in various public places about the European Union; and to provide information to further the establishment of twinning arrangements between towns in the United Kingdom and elsewhere in the European Union in accordance with the European Union’s town twinning support scheme
public_bills.title: European Union (Information, etc.)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Civil Partnership Act 2004 to include sibling couples
public_bills.title: Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Amendment) (Sibling Couples)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about automated vehicles and electric vehicles.
public_bills.title: Automated and Electric Vehicles

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the international transport of goods by road; to make provision about the registration of trailers; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Haulage Permits and Trailer Registration

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for and in connection with a code of practice containing guidance about the operation and management of private parking facilities; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Parking (Code of Practice)

public_bills.description: A Bill to introduce limits on the age of tyres on buses and coaches; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Tyres (Buses and Coaches)

public_bills.description:
To authorise the issue out of the Consolidated Fund of Northern Ireland of certain sums for the service of the year ending 31 March 2019; to appropriate those sums for specified purposes; to authorise the Department of Finance in Northern Ireland to
borrow on the credit of the appropriated sums; to authorise the use for the public service of certain resources (including accruing resources) for the year ending 31 March 2019; and to repeal certain spent provisions.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland Budget

public_bills.description: To authorise the use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2019; to authorise both the issue of sums out of the Consolidated Fund and the application of income for that year; and to appropriate the supply authorised for that year by this Act and by the Supply and Appropriation (Anticipation and Adjustments) Act 2018.
public_bills.title: Supply and Appropriation (Main Estimates)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide for a review by the Lord Chancellor of the law of England and Wales relating to divorce and judicial separation and to the dissolution of civil partnerships and the separation of civil partners
public_bills.title: Divorce (etc.) Law Review

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the definition of terminal illness in the Welfare Reform Act 2012; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Access to Welfare (Terminal Illness Definition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide that the Health and Care Professions Council be the regulatory body for counsellors and psychotherapists; to prohibit conversion therapy; to make related provision for the protection of children and adults; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Counsellors and Psychotherapists (Regulation) and Conversion Therapy

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for leave to enter or remain in the United Kingdom to be granted to the family members of refugees and to refugees who are family members of British citizens and settled persons, to provide for legal aid to be made available for refugee family reunion cases, and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Refugees (Family Reunion)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make certain acts of voyeurism an offence.
public_bills.title: Voyeurism (Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for protecting persons from risks associated with stalking; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Stalking Protection

public_bills.description: A Bill to give the Environment Agency additional powers to control and reduce discharge from combined sewer overflows; to make other provision about bathing water quality and clean beach initiatives; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Bathing Waters

public_bills.description: To amend the Animal Welfare Act 2006 in relation to service animals.
public_bills.title: Animal Welfare (Service Animals)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require employers with more than 250 employees to publish information about parental leave, and pay in the course of such leave; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Parental Leave and Pay Arrangements (Publication)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit cash machine charges; to require banks to enable free cash withdrawals from current accounts in other circumstances; to require the Financial Conduct Authority to supervise an access to banking standard; to impose penalties for breaches of that standard; to establish a financial inclusion fund, and provide for amounts received in such penalties to be paid into that fund; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Banking (Cash Machine Charges and Financial Inclusion)

public_bills.description: A Bill to establish the right to breathe clean air; to require the Secretary of State to achieve and maintain clean air in England and Wales; to involve Public Health England in setting and reviewing pollutants and their limits; to enhance the powers, duties and functions of the Environment Agency, the Committee on Climate Change, local authorities (including port authorities), the Civil Aviation Authority, Highways England, Historic England and Natural England in relation to air pollution; to establish a Citizens’ Commission for Clean Air with powers to institute or intervene in legal proceedings; to require the Secretary of State and the relevant national authorities to apply environmental principles in carrying out their duties under this Act and the clean air enactments; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Clean Air (Human Rights)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to set, measure, enforce and report on air quality targets; to make provision about mitigating air pollution, including through the use of clean air zones; to make provision about vehicle emissions testing; to restrict the approval and sale of vehicles with certain engine types; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Clean Air

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the holding of a referendum to endorse the United Kingdom and Gibraltar exit package proposed by HM Government for withdrawal from the EU, or to decide to remain a member, following the completion of formal exit negotiations; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Terms of Withdrawal from EU (Referendum)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to set, measure, enforce and report on targets for the reduction and recycling of plastic packaging; to require that such targets following the United Kingdom’s withdrawal from the European Union at least match such targets set by the European Union; to establish enforcement mechanisms in respect of such targets and associated provisions; to make provision for support for the development of sustainable alternatives to plastic packaging; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Plastics

public_bills.description: A Bill to limit exit payments made by public sector organisations to employees; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Public Sector Exit Payments (Limitation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision in connection with the protection of children and vulnerable adults in receipt of official development assistance and disaster relief.
public_bills.title: International Development (Safeguarding Vulnerable Groups)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for a single compensation scheme for passengers across train operators; to require train operators to pay automatic compensation to season ticket holders and certain other passengers where certain standards of service are not met; to allow train operators to recover compensation paid to passengers from Network Rail in certain circumstances; to establish a body to administer rail compensation; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Rail Passenger (Compensation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about multi-employer pension schemes, including provision for the protection of unincorporated businesses, such as plumbing businesses, from certain multi-employer pension scheme liabilities; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Multi-employer Pension Schemes

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Animal Welfare Act 2006 and the Animal Health and Welfare (Scotland) Act 2006 to make the theft of pets an offence; to apply certain post-conviction powers under those Acts to such an offence; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Pets (Theft)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about end of life care and support for homeless people with terminal illnesses, including through the provision of housing for such people; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Homelessness (End of Life Care)

public_bills.description: A Bill to extend the National Living Wage to people aged 18 to 24.
public_bills.title: National Living Wage (Extension to Young People)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about substance testing in prisons and similar institutions.
public_bills.title: Prisons (Substance Testing)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require certain buildings to have toilets which meet the needs of persons with a range of disability and accessibility requirements; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Toilets (Provision and Accessibility)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about health scrutiny by local authorities, including scrutiny of clinical commissioning groups' decisions; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Health Scrutiny

public_bills.description: A Bill to prevent the marketing and advertising of food that does not meet certain nutritional requirements from being targeted at children.
public_bills.title: Food Advertising (Protection of Children from Targeting)

public_bills.description: A Bill To make provision about nuclear safeguards; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Nuclear Safeguards

public_bills.description: A Bill to Amend section 3 of the Football Offences Act 1991.
public_bills.title: Football Offences (Amendment)

public_bills.description: To amend the Landlord and Tenant Act 1985 to require that residential rented accommodation is provided and maintained in a state of fitness for human habitation; to amend the Building Act 1984 to make provision about the liability for works on residential accommodation that do not comply with Building Regulations; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Homes (Fitness for Human Habitation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about postal voting at elections.
public_bills.title: Postal Voting

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to ensure that domestic properties have a minimum energy performance rating of C on an Energy Performance Certificate; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Domestic Properties (Minimum Energy Performance)

public_bills.description: a Bill to create a staff association to represent the interests of members of Her Majesty’s Armed Forces as employees; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Armed Forces Representative Body

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the appointment of the Forensic Science Regulator; to make provision about the Regulator and about the regulation of forensic science; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Forensic Science Regulator

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to prohibit the use of wild animals in travelling circuses.
public_bills.title: Wild Animals in Circuses

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about rivers authorities; to make provision about the expenses of internal drainage boards; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Rivers Authorities and Land Drainage

public_bills.description: A Bill to Provide that the Secretary of State’s powers in relation to the management of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, include the power to grant a lease in respect of land for a period of up to 150 years.
public_bills.title: Kew Gardens (Leases) (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide for the regulation of the carrying of passengers in Greater London by pedal cycles and power-assisted pedal cycles for hire or reward; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Pedicabs (London)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the regulation of the sale and use of electronic cigarettes; to exempt electronic cigarettes from UK law derived from the Tobacco Products Directive; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Electronic Cigarettes (Regulation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to restrict the entitlement of non-UK citizens to publicly-funded benefits and services; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Benefits and Public Services (Restriction)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the definition of international development assistance; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: International Development Assistance (Definition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the definition of a coastal path in England in respect of the coastal access duty under the Marine and Coastal Access Act 2009; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Coastal Path (Definition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit principal local authorities being abolished in the absence of the authority of its elected councillors and a local referendum; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Principal Local Authorities (Grounds for Abolition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the acquisition of land and property by local authorities in England outside their own local authority boundaries; to limit the power of local authorities to invest in commercial risk-taking enterprises; to limit public borrowing by local authorities for non-core activities; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Authorities (Borrowing and Investment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for co-funding and for the extension of co-payment for NHS services in England; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: National Health Service (Co-Funding and Co-Payment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to create statutory limitations on court proceedings against current and former members of the armed forces for certain alleged offences committed during military operations or similar circumstances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Armed Forces (Statute of Limitations)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make providers of social housing, local safeguarding children boards, Electoral Registration Officers, Returning Officers and the Housing Ombudsman public authorities for the purposes of the Freedom of Information Act 2000; to make information held by persons contracting with public authorities subject to the Freedom of Information Act 2000; to extend the powers of the Information Commissioner; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Freedom of Information (Extension)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit unpaid trial work periods in certain circumstances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Unpaid Trial Work Periods (Prohibition)

public_bills.description: To amend the law relating to the Social Mobility Commission.
public_bills.title: Social Justice Commission

public_bills.description: A Bill to make it an offence to attack service animals, including police dogs and horses; to make certain offences aggravated when perpetrated against such animals; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Service Animals (Offences)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the surrender, production or other delivery up of driving licences, or test certificates, in relation to certain offences; to make provision in relation to identifying persons in connection with fixed penalty notices, conditional offers and the payment of fixed penalties under the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Road Traffic Offenders (Surrender of Driving Licences etc.) (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit charging for car parking at NHS hospitals for patients, staff and visitors; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Hospital Car Parking Charges (Abolition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to remove powers of the Secretary of State in relation to the location of and planning permission for new housing developments; to give local authorities powers to establish requirements on such developments in their area, including requirements on the proportion of affordable and social housing; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Housing and Planning (Local Decision-Making)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make social media service providers liable for online publications in respect of civil proceedings in specified circumstances; to establish and confer functions upon a commissioner for online safety; to make provision about the disclosure of certain information by social media service providers; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Social Media Service Providers (Civil Liability and Oversight)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require pension providers to make lump sum payments and other pension benefits available to people with ill health, including people with a terminal diagnosis, prior to such people reaching minimum pension age; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Pension Benefits (Ill Health)

public_bills.description: A Bill to enable the Secretary of State to refuse entry, or to vary or curtail leave to enter or remain already granted, to a person who is a non-UK or non-EEA national who is known to be, or to have been, involved in gross human rights abuses or in certain acts of corruption; to make provision for financial sanctions against a person who is a non-UK or non-EEA national who is known to be, or to have been, involved in gross human rights abuses or in certain acts of corruption; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Sanctions (Human Rights Abuse and Corruption)

public_bills.description: A bill to provide for the renaming of the House of Lords as the House of Peers.
public_bills.title: House of Peers

public_bills.description: A Bill to create a Business of the House Commission to regulate the timetabling of business in the House of Commons; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Business of the House Commission

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for a national public holiday on 23 June or the subsequent weekday when 23 June falls at a weekend; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: June Bank Holiday (Creation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Secretary of State to conduct a review into DiGeorge (22q11 deletion) syndrome; to require the National Health Service to publish a strategy after the review is complete; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: DiGeorge Syndrome (Review and National Health Service Duty)

public_bills.description: A bill to make provision enabling sanctions to be imposed where appropriate for the purposes of compliance with United Nations obligations or other international obligations or for the purposes of furthering the prevention of terrorism or for the purposes of national security or international peace and security or for the purposes of furthering foreign policy objectives; to make provision for the purposes of the detection, investigation and prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing and for the purposes of implementing Standards published by the Financial Action Task Force relating to combating threats to the integrity of the international financial system; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the regulation of the processing of information relating to individuals; to make provision in connection with the Information Commissioner's functions under certain regulations relating to information; to make provision for a direct marketing code of conduct; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Data Protection

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the provision of comprehensive palliative care to those with terminal illnesses, including adults over the age of 60; to require certain public bodies to co-operate with hospices in the provision of palliative care; to make provision for support for those caring for individuals with a terminal illness; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Terminal Illness (Provision of Palliative Care and Support for Carers)

public_bills.description: A Bill to extend the period for the Secretary of State to exercise powers relating to smart metering and to provide for a special administration regime for a smart meter communication licensee.
public_bills.title: Smart Meters

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about identifying and supporting victims of modern slavery; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Modern Slavery (Victim Support)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit persons from being registered to vote in Parliamentary elections at more than one address; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Voter Registration (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require all private landlords in England to be registered; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Private Landlords (Registration)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the House of Lords Act 1999 to remove the by-election system for the election of hereditary peers; to provide for the exclusion of hereditary peers from the House of Lords over time; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: House of Lords (Exclusion of Hereditary Peers)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit charging for car parking at NHS Hospitals for patients and visitors; to make provision for NHS Hospitals to be exempt from business rates; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Hospital (Parking Charges and Business Rates)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about supervised drug consumption facilities; to make it lawful to take controlled substances within such facilities in specified circumstances; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Supervised Drug Consumption Facilities

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the marriage of same sex couples in Northern Ireland; to make provision in the law of Northern Ireland for the conversion of civil partnerships to marriages and for the review of civil partnership; to make provision for the legal recognition of the marriage of armed forces personnel overseas and of other marriages solemnised outside Northern Ireland; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Marriage (Same Sex Couples) (Northern Ireland) (No.2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to reform the Universal Credit application process; to make provision about advice and assistance for claimants, and arrangements for payments; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Universal Credit (Application, Advice and Assistance)

public_bills.description: A Bill to reduce the voting age to 16 in parliamentary and other elections; to make provision for auto-enrolment onto the electoral register for people aged 16 to 24; to make provision about the use of educational establishments as polling stations; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Representation of the People (Young People's Enfranchisement)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Matrimonial Causes Act 1973 and make provision in connection with financial settlements following divorce
public_bills.title: Divorce (Financial Provision)

public_bills.description:
To authorise the use of resources for the years ending with 31 March 2017, 31 March 2018 and 31 March 2019; to authorise the issue of sums out of the Consolidated Fund for the years ending 31 March 2018 and 31 March 2019; and to appropriate the supply
authorised by this Act for the years ending with 31 March 2017 and 31 March 2018.
public_bills.title: Supply and Appropriation (Anticipation and Adjustments)

public_bills.description: A bill to make provision about the granting of old-style secure tenancies in cases of domestic abuse.
public_bills.title: Secure Tenancies (Victims of Domestic Abuse)

public_bills.description: A bill to make provision establishing a new financial guidance body; to make provision about the funding of debt advice in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland; and to make provision about the regulation of claims management services.
public_bills.title: Financial Guidance and Claims

public_bills.description: A bill to make provision creating a new offence of shining or directing a laser beam towards a vehicle.
public_bills.title: Laser Misuse (Vehicles)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to improve access to radiotherapy treatment in England; to define access in terms of the time that patients are required to travel to places providing treatment; to specify 45 minutes as the maximum time patients are to travel; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Access to Radiotherapy

public_bills.description: A Bill to require public bodies to accompany any proposal for a change in public expenditure, administration or policy with a family impact assessment; and to require the Secretary of State to report on the costs and benefits of extending family impact assessments to local authorities and to establish and evaluate progress towards objectives and targets for family stability.
public_bills.title: Family Relationships (Impact Assessment and Targets)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the prohibition of unpaid work experience exceeding four weeks, and for connected matters
public_bills.title: Unpaid Work Experience (Prohibition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the definition of worker; to make provision about workers’ rights; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Workers (Definition and Rights)

public_bills.description: A Bill to allow persons descended from individuals born in the British Indian Ocean Territory to register as British overseas territories citizens; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: British Indian Ocean Territory (Citizenship)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose certain duties upon Her Majesty’s Government to ensure the accuracy, completeness and utility of electoral registers; to make provision for the sharing of data for the purposes of electoral registration; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Automatic Electoral Registration (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about employment conditions and workers' rights; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Employment and Workers' Rights

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision to enhance the protection available for bat habitats in the vicinity of a building site and to limit the protection for bat habitats in buildings used for public worship
public_bills.title: Bat Habitats Regulation

public_bills.description: A Bill to create an independent body to monitor broadcasting impartiality at the British Broadcasting Corporation; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: British Broadcasting Corporation (Oversight)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require public authorities to have regard to the need to consider physical and mental health impacts in the exercise of their functions; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Health Impacts (Public Sector Duty)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about access to NHS fertility services, including equality of access to such services across England; to make provision about pricing of such services; to provide for a minimum number of fertility treatments to be available to women on the basis of their age; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Access to Fertility Services

public_bills.description: To prohibit the export of live farmed animals for slaughter or fattening; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Live Animal Exports (Prohibition)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the regional rate in Northern Ireland for the year ending 31 March 2019; and amend the Renewable Heat Incentive Scheme Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2012.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland (Regional Rates and Energy)

public_bills.description: A Bill to confer power on the Secretary of State to determine salaries and other benefits for Members of the Northern Ireland Assembly in respect of periods when there is no Executive.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland Assembly Members (Pay)

public_bills.description: A Bill to Authorise the issue out of the Consolidated Fund of Northern Ireland of certain sums for the service of the years ending 31 March 2018 and 2019; to appropriate those sums for specified purposes; to authorise the use for the public service of certain resources for those years; to revise the limits on the use of certain accruing resources in the year ending 31 March 2018; and to authorise the Department of Finance in Northern Ireland to borrow on the credit of the sum appropriated for the year ending 31 March 2019.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland Budget (Anticipation and Adjustments)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make it an offence to discard needles in public places in specified circumstances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Discarded Needles (Offences)

public_bills.description: A bill to make provision for the marriage of same sex couples in Northern Ireland; to make provision for the legal recognition of the same sex marriage of armed forces personnel overseas and of other same sex marriages solemnised outside Northern Ireland; to make provision in the law of Northern Ireland for the conversion of civil partnerships to marriages and for the review of civil partnerships; to make provision for rights to pensions and social security contributions for same sex married couples and civil partners; to make provision for gender change by married persons and civil partners; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Marriage (Same Sex Couples) (Northern Ireland)

public_bills.description: A Bill to clarify the extent to which a medical practitioner with a conscientious objection may refrain from participating in certain medical activities; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Conscientious Objection (Medical Activities)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the requirements for fire safety information for occupants of certain buildings, including high-rise residential buildings.
public_bills.title: Fire Safety Information

public_bills.description: Repeal the Vagrancy Act 1824
public_bills.title: Vagrancy (Repeal)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide protection for drivers of emergency vehicles responding to emergencies from civil liability and criminal prosecution in specified circumstances; to make related provision about criminal proceedings and sentencing; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Emergency Response Drivers (Protections)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for leave to enter or remain in the United Kingdom to be granted to the family members of refugees and of people granted humanitarian protection; to provide for legal aid to be made available for such family reunion cases; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Refugees (Family Reunion) (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about space activities and suborbital activities; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Space Industry

public_bills.description: A Bill to grant certain duties, to alter other duties, and to amend the law relating to the national debt and the public revenue, and to make further provision in connection with finance.
public_bills.title: Finance

public_bills.description: A Bill to prevent abuse of process in civil and family courts; to make provision about cooperation between court jurisdictions; to create offences when certain civil and family court orders are breached; to amend the rights and duties of certain parties to prevent abuse of process in civil and family court; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Courts (Abuse of Process)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about requirements for carbon monoxide detectors; to make provision about carbon monoxide safety; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Carbon Monoxide (Detection and Safety)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about access by customers, in particular those in rural areas, to banking services; to make provision for community banking hubs; to review access to banking services through the Post Office network; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Access to Banking Services

public_bills.description: A Bill to allow the production, supply, possession and use of cannabis and cannabis resin for medicinal purposes; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Legalisation of Cannabis (Medicinal Purposes)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the length of time for which an individual may have a criminal record under the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974.
public_bills.title: Criminal Records

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for marriages taking place in any Church of England chapel licensed for the solemnization of marriages under sections 20 and 21 of the Marriage Act 1949 to be solemnized according to the rites and ceremonies of Christian denominations other than the Church of England.
public_bills.title: Ecumenical Marriage

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for members of the Regular Forces to serve part-time or subject to geographic restrictions
public_bills.title: Armed Forces (Flexible Working)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision enabling relief from non-domestic rates in England and Wales to be conferred in respect of hereditaments used for the purposes of facilitating the transmission of communications by any means involving the use of electrical or electromagnetic energy; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Telecommunications Infrastructure (Relief from Non-Domestic Rates)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the imposing of restrictions on assets owned by persons involved in conduct that gives support and assistance to terrorist organisations in the United Kingdom for the purpose of securing compensation for citizens of the United Kingdom affected by such conduct
public_bills.title: Asset Freezing (Compensation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the merging of the Nene Valley and Corby Clinical Commissioning Groups; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Northamptonshire Clinical Commissioning Groups (Merger)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the restructuring of urgent care facilities in North Northamptonshire; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: North Northamptonshire (Urgent Care Facilities)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose duties relating to the completion of the Isham Bypass by 31 December 2020; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Isham Bypass

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Government to monitor and report on food insecurity; to make provision for official statistics on food insecurity; and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Food Insecurity

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the exercise of taxi and private hire vehicle licensing functions in relation to persons about whom there are safeguarding or road safety concerns; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Licensing of Taxis and Private Hire Vehicles (Safeguarding and Road Safety)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the disclosure of information held by public authorities or by persons contracted to provide services for them or on their behalf; to amend the Freedom of Information Act 2000; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Freedom of Information (Amendment)

public_bills.description: A Bill to promote continued membership of the Open Skies Agreement.
public_bills.title: Open Skies Agreement (Membership)

public_bills.description: A Bill to repeal the International Development (Official Development Assistance Target) Act 2015.
public_bills.title: Official Development Assistance Target (Repeal)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require local authorities to facilitate the delivery of programmes that provide free meals and activities for children during school holidays; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: School Holidays (Meals and Activities)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about immigration detention safeguards for victims of torture and other vulnerable people, including those that have suffered from severe physical, psychological or sexual violence; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Immigration Detention of Victims of Torture and Other Vulnerable People (Safeguards)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the holding of referenda in relation to voting systems in local government elections
public_bills.title: Local Government Elections (Referendum)

public_bills.description: A Bill to enable the Secretary of State, or an immigration officer to refuse entry, or to vary or curtail leave to enter or remain already granted, to a person who is a non-UK or non-EEA national who is known to be, or to have been, involved in gross human rights abuses
public_bills.title: Immigration Control (Gross Human Rights Abuses)

public_bills.description:
To make provision approving for the purposes of section 8 of the European Union Act 2011 draft decisions under Article 352 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union on the participation of the Republic of Albania and the Republic of
Serbia in the work of the European Union Agency for Fundamental Rights and on the signing and conclusion of an agreement between the European Union and Canada
regarding the application of their competition laws.
public_bills.title: European Union (Approvals)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the removal of restrictions on principal local authorities in England to set levels of council tax; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Authorities (Removal of Council Tax Restrictions)

public_bills.description: A Bill to grant certain duties, to alter other duties, and to amend the law relating to the national debt and the public revenue, and to make further provision in connection with finance.
public_bills.title: Finance (No.2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Equality Act 2010 to improve access to public buildings by introducing six-inch and 12-inch rules for step-free access
public_bills.title: Equality Act 2010 (Amendment) (Disabled Access)

public_bills.description: To amend sections 71, 71A and 84 of the Civil Aviation Act 1982, and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Air Travel Organisers' Licensing

public_bills.description:
A Bill to authorise the issue out of the Consolidated Fund of Northern Ireland of certain sums for the service of the year ending 31 March 2018; to appropriate those sums for specified purposes; to authorise the Department of Finance in Northern Ireland to borrow on the credit of the appropriated sums; to authorise the use for the public service of certain resources(including accruing resources) for the year ending 31 March 2018; and to repeal certain
spent provisions.
public_bills.title: Northern Ireland Budget

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the regulation of funding and expenditure of political parties; to make provision for the phased introduction of a cap on donations to political parties; to make provision for affiliation fees from trades unions and membership organisations to political parties to be counted as individual donations in prescribed circumstances; to make provision for the public funding of political parties; to make provision for the modification of rights of candidates and parties to election addresses; to make provision for limits on political parties’ expenditure between regulated periods; to confer powers on the Electoral Commission, and for connected purposes
public_bills.title: Democratic Political Activity (Funding and Expenditure)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit permanent derogations from a 30 mile per hour speed limit in built-up areas in England; to make provision for the circumstances in which speed limits below 30 miles per hour may be introduced; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Speed Limits (England)

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the Local Audit and Accountability Act 2014 to extend public access to certain documents that are commercially confidential and documents relating to NHS bodies in England; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Audit (Public Access to Documents)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require Channel 4 to relocate its headquarters outside London; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Channel 4 (Relocation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to establish a national register of green belt land in England; to restrict the ability of local authorities to de-designate green belt land; to make provision about future development of de-designated green belt land; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Green Belt (Protection)

public_bills.description: A Bill to raise the age of criminal responsibility
public_bills.title: Age of Criminal Responsibility

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide for the High Court of England and Wales to make a preliminary finding on cases of alleged genocide; and for the subsequent referral of such findings to the International Criminal Court or a special tribunal.
public_bills.title: Genocide Determination (No. 2)

public_bills.description: A Bill to establish a review of pension arrangements for women affected by changes made by the Pensions Act 1995 and the Pensions Act 2011; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Pensions (Review of Women’s Arrangements)

public_bills.description: A Bill to create a pilot licensing system in line with International Civil Aviation Organization standards; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Pilot (Licensing)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about public awareness measures in respect of the symptoms of and screening for ovarian cancer; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Ovarian Cancer (Public Awareness)

public_bills.description: A Bill to regulate the purchase and use of drones weighing 5 kilograms or more; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Drone (Regulation)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the creation of secure safe houses for children that have been subject to human trafficking; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Human Trafficking (Child Protection)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require children under 16 to wear a safety helmet when riding a bicycle on a public highway; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Child Safety (Cycle Helmets)

public_bills.description: A Bill to prohibit members of the House of Commons who do not take the oath from receiving parliamentary allowances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Parliamentary Allowances (Restriction)

public_bills.description: A Bill to allow a person who is age 18 or older on the day of a parliamentary or local election to stand as a candidate; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Electoral Candidate (Age)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require banks to provide current accounts for homeless people seeking work; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Homeless People (Current Accounts)

public_bills.description: A Bill to set up a commission to make arrangements for debates between leaders of political parties during a General Election; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: General Election (Leaders’ Debate)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Government to obtain, on withdrawal from the European Union, a payment from the European Union not less than 50 per cent of the United Kingdom’s net contributions to that institution; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: European Union (Return of Contributions)

public_bills.description: A Bill to require the Government to publish details of meetings between the Government Whips Office in the House of Commons and the corresponding offices of other political parties in the House of Commons; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: House of Commons Whips (Transparency)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose duties relating to the provision of public education on free trade; to require regular reports from government on trade arrangements with other countries; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Free Trade (Education and Reporting)

public_bills.description: A Bill to provide for 100 per cent retention of locally collected business rates; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Local Government Finance

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision for the removal from the United Kingdom of foreign national criminal offenders and of prisoners who are citizens of European Union Member States; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Foreign Nationals (Criminal Offender and Prisoner Removal)

public_bills.description: A Bill to impose duties on the Prime Minister relating to accountability to the House of Commons; to require the Prime Minister to be available to answer questions in that House on at least two occasions during a sitting week except in specified circumstances; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Prime Minister (Accountability to House of Commons)

public_bills.description: A Bill to make provision about the requirements for non-UK citizens seeking leave to enter the United Kingdom; to make provision about a process for the removal from the United Kingdom of non-UK citizens, in certain circumstances and on the basis of established criteria; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Border Control

public_bills.description: A Bill to amend the House of Commons Administration Act 1978 to provide that the Prime Minister may only nominate as Leader of the House of Commons a Member of that House chosen following an election held amongst all Members of the House of Commons; and for connected purposes.
public_bills.title: Leader of the House of Commons (Election)
